air:FareRule.air:FareRuleLong: RULE - 001/BD01 UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED KUWAIT AIRWAYS NFP FARES APPLICATION AREA THESE FARES APPLY BETWEEN AREA 3 AND AREA 1. CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR FIRST/BUSINESS/ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES. FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS. FULL AND SEQUENTIAL USE OF FLIGHT COUPONS- THE TICKET /OR ELECTRONIC TICKET/ IS NOT VALID IF THE FIRST COUPON HAS NOT BEEN USED AND WILL NOT BE HONORED IF ALL THE COUPONS ARE NOT USED IN THE SEQUENCE PROVIDED IN THE TICKET /OR ELECTRONIC TICKET/. -------------------------------------------------- PAX WILL BE DOWNGRADED TO NEXT LOWER CABIN IF NO FIRST CLASS IS OFFERED ON ANY OF THE LEG NO REFUND APPLICABLE FOR THE DOWNGRADE OF CABIN CAPACITY LIMITATIONS THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT OTHER CONDITIONS ALL FARES ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE OR WITHDRAWAL WITHOUT NOTICE. FARES ARE ONLY GUARANTEED IF AUTO-PRICED AND TICKETED IN GDS ON THE SAME DAY. ----------------------------------------------- PASSENGER EXPENSES NOT PERMITTED. -------------------------------------- IF TRANSIT TIME AT KUWAIT AIRPORT EXCEEDS 08HOURS STPC/HOTAC WILL BE ON PASSENGER COST. --------------------------------------------- JOURNEY BETWEEN DAC AND CGP/ZYL WILL BE PERFORMED ON KU-BUS SERVICE ONLY. ------------------------------------------------- PAX WILL BE DOWNGRADED TO NEXT LOWER CABIN IF NO FIRST CLASS IS OFFERED ON ANY OF THE LEG NO REFUND APPLICABLE FOR THE DOWNGRADE OF CABIN -------------------------------------------------- WHEN ITINERARY RESULTS IN A HIGHER FARE THE FARE DIFF WILL BE COLLECTED PLUS CHANGE FEE AND IF NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN LOWER FARE THE CHANGE FEE WILL APPLY AND NO REFUND WILL BE MADE. ABOVE CHARGES APPLICABLE ONLY IF TKT IS REISSUED BEFORE DEPARTURE OF FLT

BETWEEN DAC AND NYC OUTBOUND - THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING KU FLIGHT 284 KU FLIGHT 117. INBOUND - THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY KU FLIGHT OPERATED BY KU.

UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS. NOTE - TICKET MUST BE ISSUED WITH CONFIRMED RESERVATION FOR THE ENTIRE JOURNEY. ------------------------------------------------- KU RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR WHERE ITINERARY DO NOT COMPLY WITH THE RESERVATION BOOKING CODE / RBD/ -------------------------------------------------- IF A TICKET IS USED OUT OF SEQUENCE KU RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR OR INVALIDATE THE REMAINING FLIGHT COUPONS. ------------------------------------------------- IF A PASSENGER FAILS TO TRAVEL ON A SECTOR BOOKED KU RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL THE REMAINING KU SECTOR . -------------------------------------------------- ANY VIOLATION OF MARRIED SEGMENT WOULD INCUR A DEBIT. ------------------------------------------------- TAX /SERVICE CHARGES/GOVT .LEVIES TO BE PAID AS APPLICABLE AT THE TIME OF TKT ISSUANCE. --------------------------------------------------
FOR ROUND TRIP FARES TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN 12 MONTHS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.

UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED 2 STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT - 1 IN EACH DIRECTION IN KWI AT USD 160.00 EACH. APPLIES PER ADULT AND CHILD. NO STOPOVER OCCURS IF PASSENGER TAKES NEXT AVAILABLE FLIGHT WITHIN 8 HOURS HOWEVER A STOPOVER MAY NOT EXCEED 24 HOURS. NO STOPOVERS PERMITTED.

UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED UNLIMITED TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT. NOTE - IF TRANSIT TIME EXCEEDS MORE THAN 8HOURS AND LESS 24HOURS A CHARGE OF USD125 WILL BE APPLICABLE. --------------------------------------------------

FOR L- TYPE FARES END-ON-END NOT PERMITTED. SIDE TRIPS PERMITTED. APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23. OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS -TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS WHICH CONSISTS OF NO MORE THAN 2 INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS AND THE OPEN SEGMENT AT ORIGIN MUST BE IN ONE COUNTRY. THE OPEN SEGMENT AT DESTINATION HAS NO RESTRICTIONS. MILEAGE OF THE OPEN SEGMENT MUST BE EQUAL/LESS THAN MILEAGE OF THE LONGEST FLOWN FARE COMPONENT. -TO FORM ROUND TRIPS -TO FORM CIRCLE TRIPS A MAXIMUM OF TWO INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS PERMITTED. PROVIDED - COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY V-/T-/L-/H-/B-/M- TYPE FARES FOR CARRIER KU IN ANY RULE IN THIS TARIFF.
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 01JUN THROUGH 30SEP.

UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED A SURCHARGE APPLIES. NOTE - ALL SURCHARGE WILL ACCRUE TO KU ONLY. BETWEEN NYC AND AREA 3 FOR ROUND TRIP FARES IF INFANT UNDER 02 WITHOUT A SEAT. THERE IS NO CHARGE FOR TRAVEL PER TICKET. NOTE - ALL SURCHARGE WILL ACCRUE TO KU ONLY. ORIGINATING NYC - A SURCHARGE OF USD 66.00 PER TICKET WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. NOTE - ALL SURCHARGE WILL ACCRUE TO KU ONLY. ORIGINATING AREA 3 - A SURCHARGE OF KWD 14.000 PER TICKET WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. NOTE - ALL SURCHARGE WILL ACCRUE TO KU ONLY.
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED VALID FOR TRAVEL COMMENCING ON/BEFORE 15JAN 25.

UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON/BEFORE 15JAN 25.
